directions: Heat oven to 350 degrees F.  Spray 2 quart glass baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.  In large bowl combine all hash brown ingredients; mix well.  Spread into prepared baking dish.
In small bowl stir together topping ingredients.  Spread topping evenly over hash browns.  Bake 45 minutes or until hash browns are tender.
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) package Simply Potatoes® Shredded Hash Browns
1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of chicken soup
2 cups Crystal Farms® Shredded Cheddar Cheese
title: Simply Potatoes® Cheesy Hash Browns
